resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/880145685</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>880145685</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4601</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Amazon Rainforest</string>
            <string language="es">Selva tropical de la Amazonia</string>
            <string language="ga">Foraois Bháistí na hAmasóine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amazonas Rainforest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt tropicale d'Amazone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Amazon Rainforest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Amazon Rainforest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροπικό δάσος της Αμαζώνας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet for pupils to complete by visiting an Amazon rainforest website boasting a range of online games and activities about the Ecuadorian Amazon.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo para que la cumplimenten los alumnos visitando una página web sobre una selva tropical de la Amazonia que tenga juegos y actividades en línea sobre la Amazonia del Ecuador.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre do dhaltaí le líonadh trí chuairt a thabhairt ar láithreáin gréasáin fhoraois bháistí na hAmasóine ar a bhfuill réimse cluichí agus gníomhaíochtaí ar líne faoin Amasóin Eacuadórach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT</string>
            <string language="es">ICT. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">TCF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, damit Pupillen durchführen durch das 
Besichtigen einer Amazonas rainforest Web site, die eine Strecke der 
Spiele und der Online-Dienst über das Ecuadorian Amazonas sich 
rühmt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau pour que les pupilles terminent en 
visitant un site Web de forêt tropicale d'Amazone revendiquant un 
intervalle des jeux et des activités en ligne au sujet de l'Amazone 
équatorienne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha para que as pupilas terminem visitando um 
Web site o mais rainforest de Amazon que boasting uma escala de jogos 
e de atividades em linha sobre o Ecuadorian Amazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro affinchè pupille completino 
visitando un Web site il più rainforest del Amazon che si vanta una 
gamma di giochi e di attività in linea circa il Ecuadorian Amazon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας για τους μαθητές για να ολοκληρώσουν με
την επίσκεψη ενός ιστοχώρου τροπικών δασών της Αμαζώνας που 
καυχάται ένα φάσμα των σε απευθείας σύνδεση παιχνιδιών και των 
δραστηριοτήτων για την του Εκουαδόρ Αμαζώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
